content:
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you already have a favorite spot downtown. It's always exciting to discover new places, but it's also wonderful to have a go-to spot that you know and love.

If you don't mind me asking, what's your favorite thing about that spot? Is it the food, the atmosphere, the service, or something else entirely?

Also, if you're willing to share, what's the name of the spot? I'm curious to know, and it might help others who are looking for breakfast recommendations in the area!
